description: This notice has been cancelled. This is a Request for Proposal with competitive open bidding. The  contract is planned to be carried out in Canada. The General Services and Procurement Directorate will procure on behalf of *Shared Services Canada.* The contact person is Dimeji,Temidire with e-mail dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca, phone 613-618-2048. The contract notice was issued by *Shared Services Canada* for *Shared Services Canada* and ends on *2023-06-05T15:00:00*. The planned start of the contract is unknown and the contract end date is also unknown. The contract status is *Cancelled.*
full_summary:
# Cancelled Tender Notice
=====================================

### Reference

*   Reference Number: SSC-23-00022822:T
*   Solicitation Number: BPM018886/22822
*   Amendment Number: 0

### Tender Status

This tender notice has been cancelled. Please note that the Administrator has taken this decision and any further related inquiries should be directed to the responsible official.

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification regarding the cancellation, you may contact:

*   **Name:** Dimeji Temidire
*   **Email:** [dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (613) 618-2048

### Details

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (Approvisionnement)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Ontario (sauf RCN)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada (Services partagés Canada)

The tender description has been removed as per the decision to cancel the notice. Further information regarding the reasons for cancellation would be available upon request.

Please note that the contact details provided above are subject to change and may not be up-to-date. It is advisable to verify this information prior to any communication.
================================OTHER LINES FROM CONTRACTOR SHOULD BE INCLUDED AND REFERENCED AS NEEDED==================================
================================================================("=========================== 
That seems to be everything! Are there any other textual snippets from the contractor for me to re-author?
